content: For release on delivery  1:15 p.m. EST  March 5, 2018      The Federal Reserve’s Regulatory Agenda for Foreign Banking Organizations:   What Lies Ahead for Enhanced Prudential Standards and the Volcker Rule    Remarks by     Randal K. Quarles     Vice Chairman for Supervision     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Institute of International Bankers Annual Washington Conference     Washington, D.C.                   March 5, 2018
